attributes.action: Restrict the maximum welfare cash payout to a family to the equivalent of the national minimum wage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to encourage employment we petition the government to cap any cash welfare payments, to any one family, to the adult minimum wage (based on 37.5 hour working week).  Thus ensuring that people who work are not worse off than they would be if not working. Also remove "on income support" from means testing and replace it with household income for all applicable benefits.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
